m_szDocTitle: As Xcel Follows National Playbook to Attack Solar, Ballot Results Say ‘Not in Colorado’ | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: As Xcel Follows National Playbook to Attack Solar, Ballot Results Say ‘Not in Colorado’ November 9th, 2013 by The Alliance for Solar Choice (TASC)   On the heels of Xcel’s second failure to stop the citizens of Boulder from taking control of their electricity, the utility is attacking energy choice on another front: rooftop solar. Xcel wants to penalize solar customers and eliminate the fair credit they receive for excess clean energy they deliver to the grid.
